All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AlertBox
This class is used to display a AlertBox if the User needs to be alerted
App
This class is used to generate a runnable instance of the program
Connection
This Class is used to connect to the Arduino via TCP-Connection
Main
This is the Main class of the Program, it is call by the App-Class and sets up the program an the GUI
MainController
This Class is used to connect to the JavaFX GUI which is formatted inside a FXML file.
The names of the inputs are defined by the "id"-tag in the FXML file The class has an implemented basic input validation
